titles.title: Let us Lift up holy hands

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We have come into this house,
And gathered in His name to worship Him, (x2)
We have come into this house,
And gathered in His name to worship Christ the Lord,
Worship Christ the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He is all my righteousness,
I stand complete in Him and worship Him...

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Let's forget about ourselves,
And concentrate on Him and worship Him...

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Let us open up to Him,
And let the river flow and worship Him...

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Let us lift up holy hands,
And magnify His name and worship Him...
